page.title: 05HALLOW PETROL STATIONS
page.content: There are{2 garages in Hallow.}One site is approx. 1/4 acre the other 1/2 acre.They both sell{petrol,}about 400 to 500 gallons a day,10 per cent of this is diesel. Petrol is delivered 4 times a month. Both garages are the busiest in the morning and evening with people going to and returning from work.4 star petrol is the most popular.Both garages{service cars,}2/3 cars a day, working mostly on the engines.Many people use their services.One garage sells old cars the other new.Another garage in the village sells cars but no petrol. Drinks can be bought at both garages but snacks at only one. Three people were employed at one garage while there were 10 at the other. One garage had a{breakdown service}and found this was mostly used in the Winter.
